T02D1589:105b-1: shi shya aa nu gri hna bi dhi:/
T02D1589:105b-3: gzhan don slob ma rjes su bzung ba'i cho ga
T02D1589:105b-4: / rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D1589:105b-5: // de nas gsang ba bshad par bya'o //
T02D1589:105b-6: bla ma'i bka' drin rjes dran nas //
T02D1589:105b-7: sna tshogs sgrub thabs 'grub don du //
T02D1589:105b-8: slob ma 'bebs pa'i cho ga mchog / dang po
T02D1589:105b-9: re zhig slob dpon gyis slob ma rjes su gzung
T02D1589:105b-11: shr'i he ru ka zhes bya ba'i yi ge bzhi pa'i don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas /
T02D1589:105b-12: rang yid dang mthun pa'i gnas 'jam pa'i stan la
T02D1589:105b-13: sogs pa'i gnas su lag pa'i sor mo rnams la
T02D1589:105b-14: sngags bkod la / bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag
T02D1589:105b-15: par ldan pa'i btung ba bzang po padma'i snod du
T02D1589:106a-0: sngags bkod la / bzhag la / cho ga ji lta ba bzhin @106a * //
T02D1589:106a-1: sbyangs te padma'i zhu ba'i rdzas kyis bdag nyid khrus bya'o //
T02D1589:106a-3: bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba'i don du /
T02D1589:106a-4: se gol gtogs pa sngon du 'gro bar byas la /
T02D1589:106a-5: sumbha la sogs pa gdong bzhi pa'i sngags kyi sgras mtshams bcad pa dang /
T02D1589:106a-6: go cha'i sngags drug dgod pa dang /
T02D1589:106a-7: dag pa gsum gyis sngags brjod pa de nyid kyis sems bsrungs bar bya'o //
T02D1589:106a-8: de'i rjes su yongs su dag pa'i sa gzhi la khru gang tsam gyi mandala byug par bya ste /
T02D1589:106a-9: tsandan dmar po la sogs pas zur drug pa'i tsakra bris te /
T02D1589:106a-10: de'i dbus su rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sa bon dgod /
T02D1589:106a-11: zur drug po la 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags dgod
T02D1589:106a-12: pa sngon du 'gro bas man ngag ji lta ba
T02D1589:106a-13: bzhin du skad cig gis dpa' mo drug dang ldan
T02D1589:106a-14: pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02D1589:106a-15: de nas phyi rol du khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnam pa brgyad dang ;
T02D1589:106a-16: drur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1589:106a-17: de nas aargha la sogs pas yang dag par mchod /
T02D1589:106a-18: de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo cho ga bzhin du dgug pa dang /
T02D1589:106a-22: sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1589:106a-23: bdud rtsi myang ba'i mthar bstod pa dang /
T02D1589:106a-26: de nas slob ma rjes su gzung ba'i don du
T02D1589:106a-27: tshes bcu la de bzhin du mandala byugs pa'i dbus
T02D1589:106a-28: su lha'i btung ba bzang pos bkang ba'i dbyangs kyi
T02D1589:106a-29: snod yang dag par bzhag la /
T02D1589:106a-30: de'i steng du khar ba'i snod dri ma med pa
T02D1589:106a-31: gur gum la sogs pas phyis las sindhu ra'i phye
T02D1589:106a-32: ma btsags la / gser gyi smyu gus cho ga bzhin du mngon par bris te /
T02D1589:106a-33: ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug gzhug byas la /
T02D1589:106a-34: mchod pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la ;
T02D1589:106a-35: de'i rjes su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo'i rkang pa brgyad pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1589:106a-36: rdo rje dril bu sngon du 'gro bas bstod la /
T02D1589:106a-37: ras dmar pos g-yogs la gzhag go //
T02D1589:106a-38: de nas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma phul yi
T02D1589:106b-0: ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod la bzod @106b gsol
T02D1589:106b-1: bya'o zhes slob ma rjes su gzung ba'i phyi'i mchod
T02D1589:106b-3: / de'i rjes su mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa yang dag par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1589:106b-4: ras dmar po'i mgul chings bya ba dang /
T02D1589:106b-5: ts'u ta la sogs pa'i lo ma dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1589:106b-8: 'bru lnga dang ldan par byas pa de nyid grub
T02D1589:106b-9: pa'i 'khor lo la ye shes 'khor lo dgug gzhug
T02D1589:106b-11: aargha la sogs pa'i mchod pa mthar phul la /
T02D1589:106b-12: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1589:106b-14: bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar cho ga bzhin du byas la /
T02D1589:106b-15: mchod yon la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis bstod pa bya'o //
T02D1589:106b-16: me tog dmar po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje bum pa'i khar bzhag la /
T02D1589:106b-17: de dag gi sngags ji srid 'dod pa'i bar du bzlas la /
T02D1589:106b-18: me tog dmar po gtor bas 'khor lo de nyid zhu /
T02D1589:106b-19: de nyid kyis ngo bor blta bar bya'o zhes slob
T02D1589:106b-20: ma rjes su gzung ba las bum pa lhag par
T02D1589:106b-23: // / de nas de'i rjes su bla ma dang sangs
T02D1589:106b-24: rgyas dag la mi phyed pas gus pa'i yid can
T02D1589:106b-25: slob ma dam pas mandala byas la yang nas yang
T02D1589:106b-26: du gsol ba gdab pa ste /
T02D1589:106b-27: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku //
T02D1589:106b-28: bla ma la ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D1589:106b-29: dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor mas //
T02D1589:106b-30: bdag ni byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02D1589:106b-31: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02D1589:106b-32: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar //
T02D1589:106b-33: bdag kyang rjes su drang ba'i phyir //
T02D1589:106b-34: nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol //
T02D1589:106b-36: tshes bcu'i dus su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i bla
T02D1589:106b-37: mas slob ma'i lag pa nas bzung la 'di skad
T02D1589:106b-38: gsungs so // rtog pas g-yogs pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1589:106b-39: legs pa'i sangs rgyas phyir bzlog ltar //
T02D1589:106b-40: dang ba'i chu yis bkrus pa'i sems ;
T02D1589:106b-41: / phan pa'i sems kyis 'dir gzhug bya //
T02D1589:106b-42: dad pa med pa'i sems can la //
T02D1589:106b-43: dkar po'i chos rnams mi 'byung ste //
T02D1589:106b-44: ji ltar sa bon tshig pa la //
T02D1589:106b-45: myu gu sngon po skye mi srid //
T02D1589:106b-47: de ltar slob ma dang ldan gyis //
T02D1589:107a-2: yon dang bcas pas phyag byas nas //
T02D1589:107a-3: thal mo sbyar te spyi bor bzhag / de yi rjes su slob dpon gyis //
T02D1589:107a-4: bum pa'i chu ni gzung byas nas //
T02D1589:107a-5: cho ga bzhin du khrus byas la //
T02D1589:107a-6: de nas ras dmar pos gdong bcings la thal mo snying gar sbyor du bcug ste /
T02D1589:107a-7: aoo dya na gyi gnas su kha bltas te /
T02D1589:107a-8: cho ga bzhin du slob ma bzhag la /
T02D1589:107a-9: de nas sum bha la sogs pa'i sngags kyi sgras bsrungs ba dang /
T02D1589:107a-13: gzhu yi dbyibs can du ba'i mdog /
T02D1589:107a-14: de steng sprul ba'i 'khor lo ru //
T02D1589:107a-15: gru gsum me ni 'bar ba ltar //
T02D1589:107a-16: phung po la sogs dri dag phyir //
T02D1589:107a-17: dag pa'i sngags ni brjod par bya //
T02D1589:107a-18: rang gi phung po sgyu ma bzhin //
T02D1589:107a-19: sprul pa ru ni yang bsgrub bya //
T02D1589:107a-20: skad cig gis ni lha mo bsam //
T02D1589:107a-21: phag mo snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1589:107a-22: kun nas kun du skad cig ste //
T02D1589:107a-23: skad cig gis ni gsang sngags brjod //
T02D1589:107a-24: sprul pa'i 'khor lo la song sems //
T02D1589:107a-25: g-yung drung 'khyil pa dge bar blta //
T02D1589:107a-26: smin mtshams gnas pa'i thig le ni //
T02D1589:107a-28: phyag rgya gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1589:107a-29: so sor bsdu ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D1589:107a-30: bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni //
T02D1589:107a-31: rim pa rgyas par shes par bya //
T02D1589:107a-32: de ltar bstan pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1589:107a-34: ye shes thob pa'i slob ma la //
T02D1589:107a-35: de yi che na ba spu ldang //
T02D1589:107a-36: mchi ma byung dang chu 'dzag dang //
T02D1589:107a-37: tsha ba dang ni grang ba dang //
T02D1589:107a-38: 'dar ba dang ni g-yo ba dang //
T02D1589:107a-39: aom tishta badzra zhes brjod de //
T02D1589:107a-40: brtan par gyur cig ces brjod do //
T02D1589:107a-41: rang bzhin du ni gnas pa la //
T02D1589:107a-42: bsgom pa phyi nas bstan par bya //
T02D1589:107a-43: mchod pa gsang sngags lha mo yi //
T02D1589:107a-44: lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag nyid do //
